As mentioned above, data can be in [wide or long form](https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Wide_and_narrow_data). How does one imagine this shape-shifting that seems needed now and then? Let's see. ::: callout-important ### Long Form and Wide Form Data Several tools such as DataWrapper (and others, yes, I agree, even with code, as we will see) need data transformed to a specific **shape**. this is usually mandated by the "shape or geometry" we intend to use in the visualization. We should now look at this *idea* of *shape* in data. Head off there:\ We upload our original data, pivot it, and download the pivotted data. Peasants. Now the pivotted wide-form data should work in DataWrapper. Whatever.
